#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cstring>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cmath>

int n,j,a,br,i;

long long int k,niz[1007];

int main ()
{
    scanf("%d %lld",&n,&k);


    for(int i=1;i<=n;i++) {scanf("%lld",&niz[i]);}

    for(int i=1;i<=n-1;i++) {
        for(int j=i+1;j<=n;j++) {if (niz[i]+niz[j]==k) {printf("Yes\n");return 0 ;} }
                            }

            printf("No\n");



    return 0;

}
